title: Spec tests download fails in CI

labels.name: prio-high
labels.description: Resolve issues as soon as possible.

body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**

```
 yarn run v1.22.11
$ node -r ts-node/register test/downloadTests.ts
outputDir = /home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/packages/spec-test-runner/spec-tests
Downloading https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/download/v1.1.0-beta.3/general.tar.gz - 1162439 bytes
Downloading https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/download/v1.1.0-beta.3/minimal.tar.gz - 60217618 bytes
Downloading https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/download/v1.1.0-beta.3/mainnet.tar.gz - 150162180 bytes
Downloaded  https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/download/v1.1.0-beta.3/general.tar.gz
Downloaded  https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/download/v1.1.0-beta.3/mainnet.tar.gz
Error [ERR_STREAM_PREMATURE_CLOSE]: Premature close
    at IncomingMessage.onclose (internal/streams/end-of-stream.js:117:38)
    at IncomingMessage.emit (events.js:400:28)
    at IncomingMessage.emit (domain.js:470:12)
    at TLSSocket.socketCloseListener (_http_client.js:432:11)
    at TLSSocket.emit (events.js:412:35)
    at TLSSocket.emit (domain.js:470:12)
    at net.js:675:12
    at TCP.done (_tls_wrap.js:563:7) {
  code: 'ERR_STREAM_PREMATURE_CLOSE'
```

**Expected behavior**

Not fail, consider caching the result, and retrying
